q: several of his closest advisers and political confidantes are now telling CNN that he is at least open to a presidential bid if a suitably conservative candidate fails to emerge from the early and wide-open GOP field... He hasn't completely shut the door on running, and if there is a massive void in the group of candidates, who knows what could happen?, said the adviser, who was quick to caution that there is only a five percent chance the senator will run.
